mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (user_id, title, content, image_url, view_count, is_deleted) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{viewCount}, #{isDeleted})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.profile_image_url as user_profile_image_url FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.is_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
SELECT p.*, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.profile_image_url as user_profile_image_url FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{id} AND p.is_deleted = FALSE

SELECT p.*, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.profile_image_url as user_profile_image_url FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND p.is_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE posts SET is_deleted = TRUE, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE posts SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
